overview:
Kerry brings 20+ years of experience in marketing and sales, including six years as a regional manager for CondÃ© Nast and eight years with International Events Group in Chicago.

Kerry has lived in Arizona, Louisiana, northern Virginia and Kansas, and has traveled extensively throughout the United States and Europe. Kerry has written and implemented marketing plans and award-winning ad campaigns for clients in a variety of industries.

She is married to a wonderful guy, Patrick, and has three young children, so, “watch out when you catch me on my cell phone!”
